bully is an incredible game for its time and still holds great value today the story is engaging and memorable the only downside is the frequent background crashes but those can easily be fixed using widescreen fix and silentpatch if you dont mind the 30 fps cap its absolutely worth playing  even in 2025 also the price of the game in the ukraine region is extremely affordable making it a fantastic deal
